message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for a product of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low, I could meet you halfway at $160.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I can go up to $140.
